metadata.name: Departure with Continuation #23
metadata.description:
I wrote the following when reviewing the outputs...

The wind is gone,
My windmill falls,
I reach out to catch the pieces.
Half fall in my right hand,
The others in my left,
Two stacks of colored paper.
I’m holding my windmill,
I feel the breeze in my hair.
Each hand is empty,
My windmill rises,
I can see the wind.

50% of the royalties for each edition will pass to Hydra.

Each output is generated from code written in p5js.

metadata.name: A Pixelated Dream Accumulations #16
metadata.description:
"An accumulation of the past pixelated dreams."

/////INTERACTIVITY/////
Do all the instructions below after opening the live mode.

1. To capture the screen, press the "c" button on your computer keyboard.

2. To save a 5-second .GIF from your iteration, press the "s" button on your computer keyboard. Please be patient while waiting for the piece to save and render its frames.

3. To adjust the piece resolution, you need to set your browser first and then reload the browser every time you want to capture the screen or save the rendered .GIF file.
///////////////////////

Created using Hydra and p5.js

Rangga Purnama Aji, 2022
https://linktr.ee/ranggapuraji

metadata.name: Interconnected #12
metadata.description:
Interconnected spheres dance and pulse in an otherworldly display of synchronized movement.
Each sphere is connected to its neighbors, creating a flowing and harmonious web that seems to spiral and orbit through space.
The spheres are bathed in vibrant hues of neon, as if illuminated by some unknown cosmic energy.

-HARCHI 2023

metadata.description:

metadata.name: Aesthetics of Randomness #2
metadata.description: Luck is not as random as you think.

metadata.name: Rainbow Vortex #4
metadata.description:
Each spiral is a unique blend of hues, creating a vivid and hypnotic rainbow effect.

- HARCHI 2023.

metadata.name: Earthen Soil Sonata #1
metadata.description:
Amidst the earth and soil so rich,
A symphony of growth takes pitch.

"Earthen Soil Sonata" is a vivid artwork that captures the essence of nature's harmonious growth. The piece depicts a lush landscape of greenery, where flora and fauna are in perfect unison with the rich soil beneath them.
The warm colors and intricate details bring the viewer closer to the natural world, inviting them to witness the beauty of life's interconnectedness.

-Harchi 2023

metadata.name: Complex World #30
metadata.description:
"Complex World" is a genesis collection on fx(hash).
In this collection, I present to you a series of generative voxel art consisting of 36 unique pieces. These artworks are created using JSplacement, a powerful tool that generates pseudo-random 8K displacement maps.
The surfaces produced by JSplacement form the basis of these generative voxel art pieces.
The random details and vibrant colors come together to create a captivating 3D space that invites you to imagine the possibilities of a connected future,
where technology and creativity intertwine to shape new realities.

software :Magicavoxel
size: 2048 x 2048
left 3
right 3
bottom 4

author.name: Y E G A N E H

metadata.name: Noisy Constellations #3
metadata.description:
A swirling cloud of colors and black speckles.

-HARCHI 2023.

metadata.name: Abstraktia #1
metadata.description:
Within Abstraktia's vibrant hues and dancing shapes, a portal to boundless imagination awaits, inviting all to explore their inner landscapes and embrace the beauty of abstract expression.

- HARCHI 2023

"◉◉◉" presents a collection of pointillistic drawings generated by p5js. However, the work deviates from the traditional method as employed by Georges Seurat; rather than placing the smallest units of dots, the process involves scaling down the dots from larger to smaller sizes. As a result, finer details are progressively drawn, creating a visual blend of colors as the dots overlap.
"◉◉◉" project is an exploration of pixels and dots in the computer, but also of painting itself.

The technique is an application of a simple random walk algorithm. Walkers, each designated with a color, traverse the canvas. The overlapping and colliding footprints of these walkers instigate a color-on-color confrontation, eventually creating distinguishable ground and figures. This process elicits the illusion of a visual object, exposing the viewer's cognitive processes and continuously reenacting the site of image formation.
In fact, I have painted such an abstract on a physical canvas before, and the way the p5js develops the sensation of brushstrokes and color combinations does not seem very different from the sensation of the paintbrush and canvas at that time.

Much like Damien Hirst's Spot Paintings, the multi-layered dots eventually settle at regular intervals after a specific number of iterations. The smallest dots, resembling the texture of a canvas, along with the added motion of the dots, akin to dripping paint, bestow the work with a more painterly flavor.
This piece serves as both a token of gratitude for my existing collectors and a technical demonstration of my craft.

2400 × 2400 px
p5js
2023 July
hasaqui

metadata.name: Code Gremlin #26
metadata.description:
They are sneaky, ephemeral creatures whose passion is breaking code.  They delete decimal points, change the number 1 into a lower-case L.  They change variable names, and make plus-signs into minus-signs.  The little devils cause trouble,. . . but aren't they so cute.  

Born in p5.js using p5.js example code with proprietary code from Ed Cavett.  

Press the Down Arrow to save any frame.
Click or Tap the canvas to toggle full screen mode.

Output is a 1080 x 1080 png.

Posters in the style of the 80-90s

There are many interesting variations

I hope you enjoy the process

metadata.name: MindFlow #252
metadata.description:
Consciousness flows over our mind, just like Karma goes through our body, which creates our life.

--------------------

This is an abstract generation made by pure code.

--------------------

In live mode, press 's' or 'S' to save a high resolution png (3000*4500).

Please be patient with drawing process and have fun with its tiny logo animation.
I hope you like this work and enjoy exploring your own mindflow.

Endlessworld 2022
